member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO
member.summary: This is the primary object that is used in the REST API to manage categories.
member.remarks: This object is used to populate the Category object.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.Bvin
member.summary: This is the ID of the category.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.LastUpdatedUtc
member.summary: The last updated date is used for auditing purposes to know when the category was last updated.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.StoreId
member.summary: This is the ID of the Hotcakes store. Typically, this is 1, except in multi-tenant environments.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.ParentId
member.summary: Having an ID here will make this category a child or nested category of the category that matches this ID. This helps to create nested navigation and other features.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.Name
member.summary: This is the name of the category that the customers will see in their views.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.Description
member.summary: If the description exists, it will be placed below the category banner.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.DisplaySortOrder
member.summary: Except when overridden by a “sort” querystring parameter, this value determines how the products in the category will be sorted.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.SourceType
member.summary: Allows you to define whether your category is a typical category or a placeholder link to another resource.
member.remarks: Always use the CategorySourceType enum for this property.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.SortOrder
member.summary: Allows you to define how the products in this category will be ordered.
member.remarks: Always use the CategorySortOrderDTO enum for this property.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.MetaKeywords
member.summary: These keywords are used to adjust the keywords in the source code of the category landing page for SEO.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.MetaDescription
member.summary: This description is used to adjust the description in the source code of the category landing page for SEO.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.MetaTitle
member.summary: This title is used to adjust the title in the source code of the category landing page for SEO.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.ImageUrl
member.summary: This is the image of the category that you want associated with it in the various views. It also is used to generate the category thumbnail.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.BannerImageUrl
member.summary: If populated with a URL, the specified banner will be displayed in the category header.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.CustomPageUrl
member.summary: If populated with a URL, this value will be used as the URL for the category when clicked.

member.summary: If true and if using a category as a custom link, this will cause the link to be opened in a new window when the customer clicks on it. This is only used in the CategoryRotator content block.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.ShowInTopMenu
member.summary: If true, this category will be shown in the initial list of categories in category lists.

member.summary: Except when overridden by a “sort” querystring parameter, this value determines how the products in the category will be sorted.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.TemplateName
member.summary: Allows you to specify a specify view in your viewset to be associated with this category when customers see it.

member.summary: Contains the ID of the content block that you want to use in the header area of the category.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.CategoryDTO.PostContentColumnId
member.summary: Contains the ID of the content block that you want to use in the footer area of the category.

member.summary: If true, the category name is shown in the customer-facing views.

member.summary: These keywords are additional keywords that can be used to further enhance your onsite search to find products in this category.
member.remarks: These keywords are currently not being used anywhere

member.summary: This is the primary object that is used to manage all aspects of product options in the REST API.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.Bvin
member.summary: The primary key for the option

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.StoreId
member.summary: This is the ID of the Hotcakes store. Typically, this is 1, except in multi-tenant environments.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.OptionType
member.summary: Returns a specific value to define what kind of option this is. This property is accessible through the Processor property as well.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.Name
member.summary: This is the name of the option as you want it to appear to customers. This is a localizable property.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.NameIsHidden
member.summary: If a merchant sets this to true, the viewset should observe the setting and not chose the label.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.IsVariant
member.summary: If enabled, this property defines that the option can be used as a variants to create a new SKU, price options, and more.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.IsShared
member.summary: If true, this property will allow this choice to be used across multiple products.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.Settings
member.summary: Used with the HTML OptionType when this is a Shared choice to save the default option value. All other OptionTypes will ignore this value.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.TextSettings
member.summary: Used with the HTML OptionType when this is not a Shared choice to save the default option value. All other OptionTypes will ignore this value.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionDTO.Items
member.summary: Contains a list of items that belong to this option, such as individual sizes when this is a garment size option.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO
member.summary: This is the primary object that is used to manage all aspects of product option items in the REST API.
member.remarks: The main application equivalent is OptionItem.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.Bvin
member.summary: The unique ID or primary key of the current product option item.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.StoreId
member.summary: This is the ID of the Hotcakes store. Typically, this is 1, except in multi-tenant environments.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.OptionBvin
member.summary: This value refers to the Option ID that this item belongs to.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.Name
member.summary: This is that localized name of the product option item as customers will see it.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.PriceAdjustment
member.summary: If this item belongs to a variant, this value will be the new price when this product option item is selected.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.WeightAdjustment
member.summary: If this item belongs to a variant, this value will be the new weight when this product option item is selected.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.IsLabel
member.summary: Used with the drop down list OptionType, this item will be rendered differently if true. All other OptionTypes will ignore this item unless this value is false.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.SortOrder
member.summary: This value is used to sort this item when grouped with other items.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionItemDTO.IsDefault
member.summary: When True, this item will be used as the default item over other items that might be associated with the same product option.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionSelectionDTO
member.summary: This is the primary class used for option selection in the REST API.

member.summary: The unique ID or primary key of the option.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionSelectionDTO.SelectionData
member.summary: The options or choices selected for the product.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionSettingDTO
member.summary: This is a general class used to hold a single setting for an Option.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionSettingDTO.Key
member.summary: This is the unique key or name of the setting to save.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionSettingDTO.Value
member.summary: This is the value to returned with this setting is retrieved using the key.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO
member.summary: This enumeration defines the possible types that can be used with an Option.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.Uknown
member.summary: This is the default value, but should never be used. If used, it will essentially be ignored in the system.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.DropDownList
member.summary: When specified, a drop down list is used to render the respective OptionItems. All HTML rules of a drop down list are persisted.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.RadioButtonList
member.summary: When specified, a radio button list is used to render the respective OptionItems. All HTML rules of a radio button list are persisted.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.CheckBoxes
member.summary: When specified, a check box list is used to render the respective OptionItems. All HTML rules of a check box list are persisted.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.Html
member.summary: When specified, the rendered value will use rich text or HTML. No options are displayed since there is only a single item (the value).

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.TextInput
member.summary: When specified, the rendered value will basically be a label. No options are displayed since there is only a single item (the value).

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.OptionTypesDTO.FileUpload
member.summary: When specified, the rendered output will display the ability to upload files to the customer. No options are displayed since the ability to upload is the option.

member.summary: The total physical count of items on hand.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductInventoryModeDTO.Unknown

member.summary: If the product is out of stock, it will no longer be available in the user interface and it cannot be purchased.

member.summary: When this setting is used, the product can be seen when out of stock, but it cannot be purchased.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductInventoryModeDTO.WhenOutOfStockAllowBackorders

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO
member.summary: This enumeration is used to give a meaningful value to product reviews.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.ZeroStars
member.summary: Zero stars is effectively a non-rating

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.OneStar
member.summary: One star is the lowest rating a customer can give to a product.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.TwoStars
member.summary: Two stars means that the product was not horrible, but it wasn't good either.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.ThreeStars
member.summary: Three stars reflects that the product was average. It was no better or worse than a similar product.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.FourStars
member.summary: Four starts is a great rating, meaning that the product was nearly perfect.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Catalog.ProductReviewRatingDTO.FiveStars
member.summary: Five stars are generally only awarded by customers when the product meets 100% of their expectations, including the process to get the product.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO
member.summary: This is the primary object that is used to manage all aspects of Order in the REST API.

member.summary: Contains a list of Coupons that have been applied to this order.

member.summary: Contains a list of Line Items (products) that are in the order.

member.summary: Contains a complete list of public and private notes that have been saved to the order.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.Packages
member.summary: Contains a list of packages that each are a record of shipment for one or more line items.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.Id
member.summary: This is an ID that is used primarily for the SQL data source.
member.remarks: not used as primary key, only for insert order in SQL pages

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.Bvin
member.summary: This is the primary key to uniquely identify a single order.
member.remarks: Primary Key

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.StoreId
member.summary: The identifier of the store that this order belongs to.
member.remarks: This value will always be the same, except in multi-tenant store scenarios.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.LastUpdatedUtc
member.summary: The date and time that the order was last updated, in UTC format
member.remarks: UTC

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.TimeOfOrderUtc
member.summary: The date and time that the order was placed, in UTC format
member.remarks: UTC

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.OrderNumber
member.summary: This is a text version of the order number and is assigned once the order reaches the "ToDo" state.
member.remarks: This is assigned during the AssignOrderNumber() workflow task. If a value doesn't exist, this order is likely an abandoned cart.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.ThirdPartyOrderId
member.summary: This property is primarily used for third party payment providers and other integrations, such as PayPal Express that have their own order numbers.
member.returns: String - the format depends on the third party integration
member.remarks: Currently used with the out of the box PayPal Express payment provider.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.UserEmail
member.summary: The email address of the person placing the order, usually pulled from the user account.
member.remarks: Either pulled from the user account email address property, or from the guest checkout email address field.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.UserID
member.summary: The ID that will map to the user in the Hotcakes customer repository.
member.remarks: This does not match the CMS UserID. If empty, this is likely a guest checkout.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.CustomProperties
member.summary: A collection of custom properties that contain additional meta data about the order.
member.remarks: This is an extension point for developers to use for integration, as well as Hotcakes related meta data.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.PaymentStatus
member.summary: This is an object that describes the current status of payment for the order.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.ShippingStatus
member.summary: This is an object that describes the current shipping status of the order.
member.remarks: This value should not be manually set, as it will be set conditionally based upon actions taken by the merchant.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.IsPlaced
member.summary: The order is not placed until the order is submitted from "New" to the "ToDo" state.
member.remarks: This value should not be changed manually. The value will always return true for orders that successfully are processed during checkout.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.StatusCode
member.summary: This is the ID of the payment status code of the order.
member.remarks: This should match the bvin property of the OrderPaymentStatus object.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.StatusName
member.summary: The name of the status that matches the StatusCode property as well as the store administration views.

member.summary: Address object for who is being billed for the order.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderDTO.ShippingAddress

member.summary: The order has received part but not all of the payment required.

member.summary: The order has been paid in full.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderPaymentStatusDTO.Overpaid
member.summary: The order has received more funds than necessary for the order.

member.summary: The line item(s) have not yet shipped.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO
member.summary: The OrderSnapshotDTO class is used by the REST API for Orders and carts placed by customers, merchants, as well as the shopping cart.
member.remarks: This class will generally map to the hcc_Order table in the database.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.Id
member.summary: This is an ID that is used primarily for the SQL data source.
member.remarks: not used as primary key, only for insert order in SQL pages

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.bvin
member.summary: This is the primary key to uniquely identify a single order.
member.remarks: Primary Key

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.StoreId
member.summary: The identifier of the store that this order belongs to.
member.remarks: This value will always be the same, except in multi-tenant store scenarios.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.LastUpdatedUtc
member.summary: The date and time that the order was last updated, in UTC format
member.remarks: UTC

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.TimeOfOrderUtc
member.summary: The date and time that the order was placed, in UTC format
member.remarks: UTC

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.OrderNumber
member.summary: This is a text version of the order number and is assigned once the order reaches the "ToDo" state.
member.remarks: This is assigned during the AssignOrderNumber() workflow task. If a value doesn't exist, this order is likely an abandoned cart.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.ThirdPartyOrderId
member.summary: This property is primarily used for third party payment providers and other integrations, such as PayPal Express that have their own order numbers.
member.returns: String - the format depends on the third party integration
member.remarks: Currently used with the out of the box PayPal Express payment provider.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.UserEmail
member.summary: The email address of the person placing the order, usually pulled from the user account.
member.remarks: Either pulled from the user account email address property, or from the guest checkout email address field.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.UserID
member.summary: The ID that will map to the user in the Hotcakes customer repository.
member.remarks: This does not match the CMS UserID. If empty, this is likely a guest checkout.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.CustomProperties
member.summary: A collection of custom properties that contain additional meta data about the order.
member.remarks: This is an extension point for developers to use for integration, as well as Hotcakes related meta data.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.PaymentStatus
member.summary: This is an object that describes the current status of payment for the order.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.ShippingStatus
member.summary: This is an object that describes the current shipping status of the order.
member.remarks: This value should not be manually set, as it will be set conditionally based upon actions taken by the merchant.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.IsPlaced
member.summary: The order is not placed until the order is submitted from "New" to the "ToDo" state.
member.remarks: This value should not be changed manually. The value will always return true for orders that successfully are processed during checkout.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.StatusCode
member.summary: This is the ID of the payment status code of the order.
member.remarks: This should match the bvin property of the OrderPaymentStatus object.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Orders.OrderSnapshotDTO.StatusName
member.summary: The name of the status that matches the StatusCode property as well as the store administration views.

member.summary: Address object for who is receiving the order, when shipped.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippableItemDTO.ShipSeparately
member.summary: If true, the associated product cannot be shipped with other products.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippingModeDTO
member.summary: This enumeration is used to determine where a product will be shipped from.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippingModeDTO.None
member.summary: This member should not be used.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippingModeDTO.ShipFromSite
member.summary: If specified, this will have the product ship from the store address.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippingModeDTO.ShipFromVendor
member.summary: This member dictates that the product will ship from the vendors address.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.ShippingModeDTO.ShipFromManufacturer
member.summary: When specified, the product will ship from the manufacturers address.

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.WeightTypeDTO.Pounds
member.summary: Measured in pounds

member.name: F:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Shipping.WeightTypeDTO.Kilograms
member.summary: Measured in kilograms

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO
member.summary: This is the main object that is used for all tax management in the REST API
member.remarks: The main application equivalent to this is the Tax object

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier or primary key of the tax object

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.StoreId
member.summary: This is the ID of the Hotcakes store. Typically, this is 1, except in multi-tenant environments.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.CountryIsoAlpha3
member.summary: A unique three letter code that identifies a country following the alpha 3 standard for this tax zone.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.RegionAbbreviation
member.summary: The two letter abbreviation for the region matching this tax zone.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.PostalCode
member.summary: The postal or zip code for the matching tax zone.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.TaxScheduleId
member.summary: This is the ID of the tax schedule that this tax zone belongs to.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.Rate
member.summary: This is the decimal representation of the tax rate for this zone.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.ShippingRate
member.summary: This is the decimal representation of the tax rate to apply to this zone.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxDTO.ApplyToShipping
member.summary: If true, the tax rate specified for ShippingRate will be applied to orders when they match this zone.

member.name: T:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO
member.summary: This is the main object used for tax schedules in the REST API
member.remarks: The main application equivalent of this class is TaxSchedule

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO.Id
member.summary: The unique identifier or primary key of the tax schedule object

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO.StoreId
member.summary: The date/time stamp that the referral was made, used for auditing purposes only.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO.Name
member.summary: The name of the tax schedule. This will be seen in the administration areas.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO.DefaultRate
member.summary: This is used only for VAT implementations to help calculate the correct taxes per VAT rules.

member.name: P:Hotcakes.CommerceDTO.v1.Taxes.TaxScheduleDTO.DefaultShippingRate
member.summary: This is used only for VAT implementations to help calculate the correct taxes for shipping per VAT rules.
